targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(block_timestamp,$__interval),
  sum(balance)/1000000000000 AS "KSM"
FROM total_transfers
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(block_timestamp) AND
  currency = '{"token":"KSM"}' AND
  method ~* 'Transfer'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(block_timestamp,$__interval),
  sum(balance)/1000000000000 AS "KAR"
FROM total_transfers
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(block_timestamp) AND
  currency = '{"token":"KAR"}' AND
  method ~* 'Transfer'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(block_timestamp,$__interval),
  sum(balance)/1000000000000 AS "BNC"
FROM total_transfers
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(block_timestamp) AND
  currency = '{"native":"BNC"}' AND
  section = 'balances' AND
  method = 'Transfer'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(block_timestamp,$__interval),
  sum(balance)/1000000000000 AS "KUSD"
FROM total_transfers
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(block_timestamp) AND
  currency = '{"stable":"KUSD"}' AND
  method ~* 'Transfer'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(block_timestamp,$__interval),
  sum(balance)/1000000000000 AS "ZLK"
FROM total_transfers
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(block_timestamp) AND
  currency = '{"token":"ZLK"}' AND
  method ~* 'Transfer'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(block_timestamp,$__interval),
  sum(balance)/1000000000000 AS "vsBond"
FROM total_transfers
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(block_timestamp) AND
  currency !~* '{"vsBond":'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(block_timestamp,$__interval),
  avg(tvl) AS "vETH"
FROM tvls
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(block_timestamp) AND
  currency = '{"vToken":"ETH"}' AND
  isdex = 'false'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(block_timestamp,$__interval),
  avg(tvl) AS "vsDOT"
FROM tvls
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(block_timestamp) AND
  currency = '{"vsToken":"DOT"}' AND
  isdex = 'false'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(block_timestamp,$__interval),
  avg(tvl) AS "vsKSM"
FROM tvls
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(block_timestamp) AND
  currency = '{"vsToken":"KSM"}' AND
  isdex = 'false'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(block_timestamp,$__interval),
  sum(tvl) AS "dex"
FROM tvls
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(block_timestamp) AND
  isdex = 'true'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(block_timestamp,$__interval),
  avg(tvl) AS "KSM(dex)"
FROM tvls
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(block_timestamp) AND
  currency = '{"Token":"KSM"}' AND
  isdex = 'true'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(block_timestamp,$__interval),

FROM tvls
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(block_timestamp) AND

GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(block_timestamp,$__interval),

SELECT

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(block_timestamp,$__interval),

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(block_timestamp,$__interval),
  avg(price) AS "{""vsBond"":[""BNC"",2001,13,20]}"
FROM vs_bond_order_clinchds
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(block_timestamp) AND
  currency = '{"vsBond":["BNC",2001,13,20]}'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  block_timestamp AS "time",
  price,
  currency
FROM vs_bond_order_clinchds
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(block_timestamp)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(block_timestamp,$__interval),
  avg(price) AS "{""vsBond"":[""DOT"",2000,13,20]}"
FROM vs_bond_order_clinchds
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(block_timestamp) AND
  currency = '{"vsBond":["DOT",2000,6,13]}'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1
